pageContent: Background: Genetic variants in antioxidant pathways might decrease the efficacy of radiation therapy (RT) by suppressing the generation of reactive oxygen species. We studied the association between single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) in the antioxidant gene superoxide dismutase-2 (SOD2) and cancer-specific outcomes after RT.

metaData.source:
A specific molecular beacon probe for the detection of human prostate cancer cells
